merged_segments.text:
[Segment 1 | 0.0s → 2.0s] Welcome to 100 days of code guys.

[Segment 2 | 2.0s → 7.0s] In 100 days of code, we are going to learn Python programming from zero to job ready.

[Segment 3 | 7.0s → 10.0s] And if you have given your 100 days, dedicated 100 days,

[Segment 4 | 10.0s → 13.0s] then I will tell you in the bite size lesson.

[Segment 5 | 13.0s → 17.0s] Python programming, we will take it as a 0-zero advance.
[Segment 6 | 17.0s → 22.0s] Starting, I will show you how easy and easy it is to play children and play Python.
